data.name: Signup_ActivationActive
data.value: If you wish to engage further, you can make yourself available for calls-to-action, at no obligation whatsoever to show up, attend, or take part in any particular one of them.

data.name: Signup_ActivationActiveHeader
data.value: {0} At Opportunity
data.comment: {0} is the Activist label for the org.

data.name: Signup_ActivationLevel
data.value: How much do you wish to engage?

data.name: Signup_ActivationLevelText
data.value: There are many different levels you can engage at in {0}. Select your intended level below (which you can change at will later, of course):

data.name: Signup_ActivationPassive
data.value: This is the default level, and means you'll take normal part in the organization as a grassroots {0}.
data.comment: {0} is the Participantship name (membership, ambassadorship etc).

data.name: Signup_ActivationPassiveApplication
data.value: This is the default level, which means you can engage as much as you want (or not) as {0} while awaiting your {1}.

data.name: Signup_ActivationPassiveHeader
data.value: Regular {0}
data.comment: {0} is the Regular Participant label for the org.

data.name: Signup_ActivationVolunteer
data.value: If you wish to volunteer for taking formal responsibility for some part of the organization, helping out where it's needed most, it's obviously most welcome. (You'll get a selection of positions to volunteer for on the next page.)

data.name: Signup_ActivationVolunteerHeader
data.value: Officer Volunteer

data.name: Signup_ApplicationApproval
data.value: You are submitting an Application for a {0} with {1}. There are no fees related to submitting the Application as such.

data.name: Signup_ApplyingFor
data.value: Applying for a {0} in {1}

data.name: Signup_DashboardMessage
data.value:
Welcome! This is the Dashboard, where you can access internal functionality of {0}. You will get more information in mail shortly.

If you volunteered for taking formal responsibility, somebody (probably also a volunteer, like yourself) will contact you to discuss more about the opportunities available.

data.name: Signup_DefaultFirstPageText
data.value: This is the organization's custom welcome text. It has not yet been written; it is set in Admin / Org Settings.

data.name: Signup_DefaultLastPageText
data.value: This is the organization-specific text shown for Signup Finalization. It is set in Admin / Org Settings. When the new person presses Finish, they will be entered into the organization, logged on, and sent to the Dashboard as a Beginner user.

data.name: Signup_DefaultSidebarText
data.value: This is the organization's short sidebar info. It is set in Administration / Org Settings.

data.name: Signup_Error_MailExists
data.value: You have already signed up to this Swarmops server. Please use the Reset Password function from the login screen instead of creating a new account.

data.name: Signup_Error_NeedPassword
data.value: Please select and retype a password.

data.name: Signup_Error_PasswordMismatch
data.value: The two password copies do not match.

data.name: Signup_Error_SelectActivationLevel
data.value: Please select your desired activity level.

data.name: Signup_Error_SelectPosition
data.value: Please select at least one position.

data.name: Signup_FeeHeader
data.value: Fees and Costs

data.name: Signup_FeeRenewalText
data.value: There is no cost whatsoever to sign up for a {0} {1}. However, there will be a fee to renew your {1} when it expires on {2}. That fee is currently {3} {4:N2}, and you're under no obligation to renew.
data.comment: {0} {1} is duration and Participantship, like "one-year Membership". {2} is the projected expiration date. {3} {4} is the renewal fee as it's currently set (NB: it may be different when the date is reached).

data.name: Signup_FeeText
data.value: The {0} fee is {1} {2:N2} for {3}. You will get an invoice at the end of this process. (You can terminate your {0} at any time.)
data.comment: {0} is the Participantship title. {1} and {2} are the currency and amount. {3} is the duration, like "one year" or "two years" (set in Organization Settings).

data.name: Signup_FinalizeSignup
data.value: Finalize Signup

data.name: Signup_MailLoginKey
data.value: Your logon (your mail)

data.name: Signup_NoFeeText
data.value: There is no cost whatsoever in signing up for a {0} with {2}, nor any cost to renew when it expires on {1}. In addition, you may terminate your {0} at any time.
data.comment: {0} is the Participantship title. {1} is the expiry date. {2} is the organization name.

data.name: Signup_Password1
data.value: Choose a password

data.name: Signup_Password2
data.value: Repeat that password

data.value: Check the position you'd like to volunteer/apply for. You can check several.

data.value: Welcome to {0}

data.value: Your Logon

data.name: Signup_YourLogonText
data.value: Please select a password to log on to Swarmops (this system). You will be able to replace this with a Twitter, Facebook, or BitID login for convenience later.
